text: nirva#pEqdyaH kAqmayE#taq kalpE#raqnniti# yathAdEvaqtama#vaqdAya# yathA dEvaqtaM ~Mya#jEd-BAgaqdhEyE#naiqvainAn# yathAyaqthaM ka#lpayatiq kalpa#nta Eqvaindra-mEkA#daSakapAlaqM nirva#pEd-vaiSvadEqvaM dvAda#SakapAlaqM grAma#kAmaq indra#M caiqva viSvA(gg)#Sca dEqvAnth-svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq ta EqvAsmai# sajAqtAn praya#cCanti grAqmyE#va Ba#vatyaiqndrasyA#vaqdAya# vaiSvadEqvasyAva# dyEqdathaiqndrasyOq- [  ]  60
